00008 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00009 
00010 template <class Class, class T, class Result = T>
00011 struct access_member_ptr
00012 {
00013     access_member_ptr(T Class::* mem_ptr)
00014       : mem_ptr(mem_ptr)
00015     {}
00016 
00017     Result operator()(Class const& x) const
00018     {
00019         return const_cast<Class&>(x).*mem_ptr;
00020     }
00021 
00022     void operator()(Class& x, T const& value) const
00023     {
00024         x.*mem_ptr = value;
00025     }
00026 
00027     T Class::* mem_ptr;
00028 };
00029 
00030 }} // namespace luabind::detail
